name: Blubrry PowerPress Podcasting plugin MultiSite add-on
author: Angelo Mandato, Blubrry

sections.description:
Add MultiSite functionality for managing PowerPress, requires MultiSite 3.8 or newer and PowerPress 5.0.7 or newer.

PowerPress MultiSite Features

  • Services and Statistics Management: Manage each site’s services and statistics from the network level
  • Disable Services and Statistics: Disable the services and statistics settings in network sites (so your site users cannot modify them)
  • More features on the way. Have a feature suggestion, please let us know: Contact Blubrry

REQUIREMENTS

  • Requires PowerPress 5.0.7 or newer
  • WordPress MultiSite 3.8 or newer
sections.installation:
1. Copy/Upload the entire powerpress-multisite directory from the downloaded zip file into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the “Blubrry PowerPress Podcasting plugin MultiSite add-on” plugin in the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy.
sections.changelog:
0.1.1

  • Released on 03/15/2020
  • Fixed warning message from being displayed when no checkboxes are selected upon saving settings.
  • Tested with latest versions of PHP (up to 7.3) and latest WordPress 5.4.
  • Moved translation load text domain to init function.

0.1

  • Released on 7/1/2014
  • First beta version
